title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: Question-Based Online Gamification for Improving Information Literacy in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic internet research skills and general interest in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can independently generate and document at least three levels of in-depth questions during the exploration of scientific topics.
Learners can critically evaluate provided information in an online gaming environment and identify credible sources with 80% accuracy.
Learners can synthesize information gathered through PBL activities and present scientific problem-solving solutions in a logical structure of three or more stages.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
